roles.title: AI-Driven Product Design
roles.subtitle: Crafting seamless, intelligent experiences
roles.description: Designing intuitive and scalable AI-powered experiences that enhance decision-making, automation, and human-AI interaction — with ethics and usability in mind.

roles.title: Scalable UX & Design Systems
roles.subtitle: Bringing structure and consistency to design
roles.description: Building and evolving structured design systems that create consistency, improve efficiency, and streamline collaboration between design and engineering.

roles.title: Strategy & Research
roles.subtitle: Balancing user needs, business goals, and technical feasibility.
roles.description: Aligning product strategy with user needs and business goals by leveraging UX research and data-driven insights to create meaningful, scalable experiences that drive impact and improve key product metrics.

roles.title: Full Stack Web Development
roles.subtitle: Bridging design and development with a strong technical foundation
roles.description: Collaborating closely with engineers to bridge design and development, applying front-end knowledge to ensure scalable, high-performance interfaces.

process.title: Research
process.description: I dive into customer needs and business challenges to uncover insights. Bonus: I can analyse datasets to support research with data-driven insights.

process.title: Principles & Strategy
process.description: I create guiding principles that shape UX decisions and keep teams aligned throughout the project.

process.title: User Journey
process.description: I break down user journeys, stories, and decision-making patterns to create seamless, intuitive experiences.

process.title: Exploration
process.description: I explore a wide range of possibilities—testing, discussing, and working through challenges to find the best approach.

process.title: Refinement
process.description: I refine and document the final design, ensuring it’s ready for development with all the necessary details.

process.title: Handover
process.description: I work closely with developers to ensure a smooth handover and implementation. I can also jump in to support front-end development when needed.

process.title: Supporting
process.description: I stay involved during implementation, making adjustments if needed to refine the final experience.

values.title: Making a Positive Impact
values.description: Every decision I make aims to create products that are useful, inclusive, and make a real difference. I believe design should solve problems and improve people's lives, even in small ways.

values.title: Curiosity & Iteration
values.description: I approach design with an experimental mindset, asking 'What if?' and iterating quickly to drive innovation. I value data-driven decisions that solve complex user challenges.

values.title: Collaboration & Versatility
values.description: I thrive in collaborative environments, whether working within centralised design teams or cross-functional groups. My experience across education, SaaS, and emerging tech helps me adapt quickly and bring fresh perspectives to every project.

values.title: Designing with Precision
values.description: I focus on the small things that make a big impact—whether it’s pixel-perfect UI, a seamless user flow, or ensuring consistency across a design system.

values.title: Balancing Creativity & Logic
values.description: I believe the best designs come from balancing creativity with logic. I love combining bold ideas with a solid technical foundation to create products that are beautiful, functional, and scalable.

values.title: Lifelong Learning
values.description: I love learning — whether it’s a new design approach, a coding framework, or an analytics tool. Staying adaptable helps me push my skills forward and build better experiences.
